channel.title: ^6 ox Oil Spot MFA thesis
channel.description: This MFA thesis explains: ^6 oil spots in depth, as well as providing a number of excellent oil spot glazes with associated pictures. I've tried a number of them and they are beautiful. Cone_6-Oil_Spot.pdf (3.2 MB)
